1.title: Configuration
1.content: Just the Docs has some specific configuration parameters that can be defined in your Jekyll site’s _config.yml file. View this site’s _config.yml file as an example.

2.title: Site logo
2.content: # Set a path/url to a logo that will be displayed instead of the title logo: "/assets/images/just-the-docs.png" .
